short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse and bulk download images on webpage and website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily and quickly download all the images (or the ones you are interested in) from any web page.
The extension automatically detects all the images and photos, previews each file and then allows you to download all of them (or just the ones you select).
In addition to the images, you can also download their metadata files.
